name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Elmephisto)
description:
Gloabl game Jam 2019 entry on the theme "what does home mean to you"

Help a skeleton find his way back home to his grave ! 

Roam a moody cemetery and find scattered parts to re-assemble the missing skeleton. 

Send us screenshots of your skeletons @ElMephisto and @exidhor !

We're always looking for feedback ! If you found a bug or if you want a custom item for your skeleton, tell us on Twitter.
